name: Prison of the Magi: Chapter One (demo)
name_original: Prison of the Magi: Chapter One (demo)
description:
Prison of the Magi: Chapter 01 is a first person open world horror game inspired by Russian folklore, witchcraft, and the works of D. Lynch.
This is the first 10 minutes of the game in it's current form, and includes a few parts of the Gloaming Isles for players to explore. Discover mysteries and try not to sink into the dark waters, while witnessing the truly uncanny. 

INSTRUCTIONS: 

  • MOUSE 1= INTERACT
  • MOUSE 2= ALTERNATE INTERACTION
  • TAB= INVENTORY
  • SHIFT= RUN
  • SPACE= JUMP
  • WASD= MOVE
  • Q/E= TILT
  • ESC= PAUSE
  • NUMBERS= EQUIPMENT

WARNING: DEATH RESTARTS THE DEMO!!!

Property of Honeycomb Interactive, designed and developed by Grant Andrew Ervin.
